## Products interface

The Products object is the top-level object returned in a product search.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Products 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [aggregations?](./magento-api.products.aggregations.md) | Maybe&lt;Array&lt;Maybe&lt;[Aggregation](./magento-api.aggregation.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Layered navigation aggregations. |
|  [filters?](./magento-api.products.filters.md) | Maybe&lt;Array&lt;Maybe&lt;[LayerFilter](./magento-api.layerfilter.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Layered navigation filters array. |
|  [items?](./magento-api.products.items.md) | Maybe&lt;Array&lt;Maybe&lt;[ProductInterface](./magento-api.productinterface.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> An array of products that match the specified search criteria. |
|  [page\_info?](./magento-api.products.page_info.md) | Maybe&lt;[SearchResultPageInfo](./magento-api.searchresultpageinfo.md)<!-- -->&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> An object that includes the page\_info and currentPage values specified in the query. |
|  [sort\_fields?](./magento-api.products.sort_fields.md) | Maybe&lt;[SortFields](./magento-api.sortfields.md)<!-- -->&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> An object that includes the default sort field and all available sort fields. |
|  [total\_count?](./magento-api.products.total_count.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Int'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The number of products that are marked as visible. By default, in complex products, parent products are visible, but their child products are not. |
